title: Average regular season home attendance of the Chicago Bears 2008 to 2019
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average attendance, with a total of 12 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 2019 to 2016.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is moderately positive which exists from 2014 to 2011.
Similarly, the next significant trend is moderately negative which exists from 2011 to 2008.
Differently, the next significant trend is slightly positive which exists from 2016 to 2014.
gold: This graph depicts the average regular season home attendance of the Chicago Bears from 2008 to 2019 . In 2019 , the average attendance at home games of the Chicago Bears was 61,916 .
